title: Timer with various time switch points
name: LGF_TimerSwitch
description: This block is a timer. It is possible to define daily, weekly, monthly, yearly time switch points and time switch points for working days or weekend days.

input.name: onMonth
input.description: Month, in which the signal shall be set.

input.name: onDay
input.description: Day, at which the signal shall be set.

input.name: onWeekday
input.description: Day of the week on which the signal will be set; Sunday: 1, Monday: 2, Tuesday: 3, ...

input.name: onHour
input.description: Hour, at which the signal shall be set.

input.name: onMinute
input.description: Minute, at which the signal shall be set.

input.name: offMonth
input.description: Month, in which the signal shall be reset.

input.name: offDay
input.description: Day, at which the signal shall be reset.

input.name: offWeekday
input.description: Day of the week on which the signal will be reset; Sunday: 1, Monday: 2, Tuesday: 3, ...

input.name: offHour
input.description: Hour, at which the signal shall be reset.

input.name: offMinute
input.description: Minute, at which the signal shall be reset.

input.name: mode
input.description: Specifies the mode (see Principle of operation)

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification
